verses.name: Ezekiel 28:4
verses.text: With thy wisdom and with thine understanding thou hast gotten thee riches, and hast gotten gold and silver into thy treasures:

verses.name: Ezekiel 28:5
verses.text: By thy great wisdom and by thy traffick hast thou increased thy riches, and thine heart is lifted up because of thy riches:

verses.name: Ezekiel 28:6
verses.text: Therefore thus saith the Lord God; Because thou hast set thine heart as the heart of God;

verses.name: Ezekiel 28:7
verses.text: Behold, therefore I will bring strangers upon thee, the terrible of the nations: and they shall draw their swords against the beauty of thy wisdom, and they shall defile thy brightness.
